sections.purpose: To provide controlled humidity and temperature conditions for stability testing.
sections.scope: Applicable to storage and stability activities in Pharmaceutical Analysis.
procedure: Ensure the water reservoir is filled with purified water.
Set the required temperature and humidity (e.g., 25Â°C / 60% RH).
Allow the chamber to reach set points and stabilize.
Place samples in the chamber ensuring proper spacing for air circulation.
Monitor the display daily and record temperature/humidity values.
Check water levels periodically and top up as needed.
Conduct scheduled inspections for any alarm conditions.
Record all maintenance and calibration activities.
precautions: Use only distilled or deionized water to prevent scale build-up.
Minimize the frequency and duration of door openings.
Do not overload the chamber beyond its capacity.
Report any deviations from set storage conditions immediately.
